name: url
description: Base URL of the book pages.

name: start_date
description: Start date for period of analytics info.

name: end_date
description: End date for period of analytics info.

name: average_time
description: Average time (in seconds) spent on each page.

name: unique_views
description: Unique views for several different dimensions. Unique views is the number of sessions during which the specified page was viewed at least once. A unique pageview is counted for each page URL + page title combination.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Unique views per users' country, derived from their IP addresses or Geographical IDs.

fields.name: referrer
fields.description: Unique views per referrer, the full referring URL including the hostname and path.

fields.name: social_network
fields.description: Unique views per social network. This is related to the referring social network for traffic sources; e.g., Google+, Blogger.

name: sessions
description: Total number of sessions for several different dimensions.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Unique views per users' country, derived from their IP addresses or Geographical IDs.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Sessions per source of referrals. For manual campaign tracking, it is the value of the utm_source campaign tracking parameter. For AdWords autotagging, it is google. If you use neither, it is the domain of the source (e.g., document.referrer) referring the users. It may also contain a port address. If users arrived without a referrer, its value is (direct)..

name: release_date
description: Last day of the release month. Table is partitioned on this column.
